https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/nEFxVTf28wgGiI2kaPd0gyXA2kz.jpg An in-depth and provocative look at the 1992 Los Angeles riots exploring the roots of civil unrest in California and the relationship between African Americans and LAPD. Burn Motherfucker, Burn!
